item.title: Two oral presentations accepted at ACS Spring 2026
item.description:
Two oral presentations have been accepted for ACS Spring 2026 (Atlanta, GA) in the ENVR Division:

  • Mussels-as-membranes: Living biofilters for microplastics & PFAS
  • Membrane-proximal aging of microplastics enhances PFAS release and uptake by human cell membranes

Both presentations will be delivered in person. Session details will be announced in January 2026.
